html:
9.7.24  11:52 pm   i think questions is spelled wrong at the top

      i think you read it wrong. you're supposed to read the colored letters first

9.7.24  10:49 pm   do you ever sleep or do you just spend your entire time answering these questions? i'm looking at these timestamps and it doesn't seem like you ever take a break

      yea but the time stamps are only on the questions, not the answers. that's part of my secret, i just do the answers

9.7.24  10:46 pm   What are your thoughts on octopuses?

      i don't know the real ones, i only know them from folklore

9.7.24  10:38 pm   what do you think about incandescent light bulbs?

      i can never remember which ones are the candescent and which ones are not

9.7.24  10:37 pm   Do you think things you do is correct and way it should be

      it can be hard to pin down what should be

9.7.24  10:21 pm   Can science explain love?

      sure but then who's gonna explain science. never mind, i just got that

9.7.24  8:45 pm   do you like avocados? had a dream where you didnt

      that's weird i had a dream that you had that dream

9.7.24  6:47 pm   i think i read that you were having trouble with the name for "the ending", and that you also tend to have a name you refer to a song as amongst yourself before finalizing the public thing. my question: what did you call "the ending" before it got that name? 

      first line

9.7.24  6:28 pm   Why does your music make me cry in a good way?

      perhaps you are my 'target audience'

9.7.24  5:56 pm   how do i get out of bed in the morning

      the trick is to be in bed just before morning

9.7.24  4:52 pm   What is choice

      it's when you have multiple options, and you have to decide which one to go with

9.7.24  4:24 pm   Are horses real?

      yes

9.7.24  4:24 pm   I'd like all of human experience (everyone that is living and dead) to be condensed into a pill that I could swallow. Then I would know everything that humans ever knew, and after winning a few gameshows I'd spend the rest of my life making all of it public knowledge. If /you/ could have a wish granted, what would it be?

      maybe i could host some of those game shows

9.7.24  4:17 pm   I know that sometimes people can be strangely talkative when asking questions, just going on and on with no real direction, keeping you in constant anticipation of when the actual thing they wanted to say will be said. This goes for me aswell because I've already started doing it, and since I have now said that I know I'm doing it I can't exactly tell if that makes it better or worse.
Anyways what I'm trying to ask you is what your favorite color is

      for each time, place, and purpose, i'd favor a different color. that's just what it's like to live in a multicolored world, i'm sorry about that

9.7.24  2:35 pm   in soap tips, you said to walk 100 miles and transport the soap to where you're going. I did that, what should i do now

      walk back

9.7.24  2:33 pm   Can we make somebody new feel great each day?

      i'll admit that seems feasible

9.7.24  1:07 pm   someone recently told me love is a made up concept. i dont understand what thats meant to mean. perhaps because everything i do and my worldview is based on love.

      it's used as a mascot for a lot of things, which may be what's irritating this person, but it's based on something so much more profound that it dwarfs any word you'd ever find for it

9.7.24  1:06 pm   help i cant stop listening to "meet me in september" on repeat

      listening to it again will help

9.7.24  12:28 pm   what to do when feeling so dejected and hopeless?

      it helps for me to explain the situation to someone else. but that might not work for everyone

9.7.24  11:20 am   should knowledge be free

      knowledge is always priced correctly, but i don't know how to explain what that price is. it is free and also priceless, but you can also work for it and the work isn't wasted

9.7.24  9:49 am   What is a good question to ask someone?

      "What is a good question to ask someone?"

9.7.24  8:57 am   do you know any party tricks?

      no

9.7.24  6:46 am   you reference dreams a lot in your songs. did you get ideas for songs through dreams or do dreams have some sort of significance in your life or am i overthinking things?

      i've become aware that i use the word 'dream' too much. i will try to stop except sometimes that just makes me say it more. i'm sorry about that

9.7.24  6:08 am   bill, i'm at that stage of life (seventeen) (17) when i know where my life is going in the short term but not in the long term and that gives me the creeps. how do i find enjoyment and direction in my life. also how does one enter the mindspace of being self-existential and contemplative

      i think there's a certain kind of socks you can get

9.7.24  1:49 am   Bill i am really excited about your next video, when can we expect it? 

      you can expect a lot of videos and songs from me over the course of the next several years

9.7.24  1:49 am   What's the antonym of anger?

      it's not always possible to find one exact antonym, but how about 'calm compassionate understanding'

9.7.24  1:27 am   do you get annoyed by product placement in songs?

      no, but sometimes the artist may get annoyed if it makes the listeners feel less profoundly toward the song

9.7.24  1:05 am   best gift youve ever gotten?

      i don't rank my gifts. that's so the other ones don't seem worse

9.7.24  12:26 am   Do you think that change and movement always go hand in hand? You often answer 'movement' to the 'what is life question' and I often answer with 'change' because I think life is a river, which is moving, and so changing. Or it's like two things going all over the place and bumping into each other (change&movement). To me, this seems like almost the same answer, but you can have change without movement but NOT movement without change. Wondering what you think about the relationship between those two concepts.

      i can see the similarity

9.7.24  12:20 am   would i ever and will i ever know about, "it"

      yes, regardless of what that may be

9.7.24  12:16 am   does tomorrow come before today or after?

      after

9.6.24  11:26 pm   when and how.. did d you use jeans in "at the aiport terminal?"

      the last verse has jeans used as a slow shaker sound. just rubbing the denim back and forth

9.6.24  10:36 pm   do you ever remember that you might forget about something, and try to remember to not forget about it for a while, but end up forgetting it and remember that you forgot it

      yes, but usually later i remember it again

9.6.24  9:46 pm   Bill, how much flour do I use?

      i hope you get a chance to try all different amounts

9.6.24  9:19 pm   How do you define success?

      usually whenever you achieve something that you were trying to do, that is considered success. if you achieve what you tried to do, it can be said that you've done that thing "successfully"

9.6.24  7:37 pm   why did you choose Helvetica as the font you use the most in your videos?

      it's normal

9.6.24  7:00 pm   Is 'Fy Around' about a trip?

      no

9.6.24  6:10 pm   crunchy or creamy peanut butter 

      check the label, it's usually right

9.6.24  5:50 pm   Have you ever done a thing but then you were like oh wait no I need to do a different thing instead so then you do that different thing but then you realize that the first thing was the thing that you were supposed to do so you go back and do the first thing again only to realize again that the second thing was the right thing so you do the second thing again but then realize that the first and second thing were both wrong so you do a third thing but then you realize that the first thing was right all along so you go to do the first thing again but then you question if you're actually right about the first thing and instead you just do nothing? 

      yes

9.6.24  5:06 pm   What makes people do things?

      it's the same thing that makes you wanna know that. sorry i don't know if that helps

9.6.24  4:34 pm   the funny dog man is talking to me, he wants me to ask you if the sky is real

      as long as the sky is itself

9.6.24  4:12 pm   learning music theory worth it or naw?

      discovering music is worth it. sorry i don't know if that's what you meant

9.6.24  3:15 pm   1. When was the last time you ate at a restaurant?

     i don't recall

     2. Did the server do the thing where they ask you about your day while you're paying?

     they asked me about my entire life

9.6.24  2:43 pm   What's the best melody you've made?

      only the listener knows that at the moment they happen to be listening to it. but i'd prefer to do it better in the future anyway

9.6.24  2:37 pm   Why did you unhonestly respond to the outside question by saying "MAYBE it's a brand name", despite you being the one who created the video?

     sorry i thought we were talking about fiction, and imagination

      And also, was you putting "spaceshipp" into the video instead of spaceship accidental or intentional, and if it was intentional, why did you do it?

     i actually don't remember 'spaceshipp', but let me take a look at it. i'm 99% sure that's intentional, that would be really hard to miss. in that context, in that position in that song, the most obvious reason why i would have done that is 'for fun'. fun is one of several ingredients i use in the making of songs and music videos, in my best attempts to create the strongest overall viewing and listening experience that i can

9.6.24  2:27 pm   What is your political affiliation? 

      i always just vote for everyone. keep it simple

9.6.24  1:53 pm   How do you always make sense.....

      don't kid yourself. everything makes sense

9.6.24  1:16 pm   What is life?

      movement

9.6.24  12:39 pm   star wars or star trek

      they both exist, and your question contains the names of both. it's possible that you are watching one or the other right now, but i don't have the technology to determine that

9.6.24  12:30 pm   what are your thoughts on thoughts

      it's a world, in your mind
